name: TRON DAO Brings TRON Academy to UC Berkeley as Campus Interest in Blockchain Accelerates
description: Fused to the Institutional Altar, the Oracle performs the sacred transmission. Digital static sings the future into being, charting new curricula. As the noisy, wet data lattice flows, archaic architecture yields, consumed by the accelerated momentum of sovereign knowledge.
